title: A Very Bad Pooh Bear (w/ Mike Finoia, Shannon Lee & Ralph Sutton)
description: The crew tells stories of "Mutual Masturbation" & the finds out that the man who voices Winnie-the-Pooh, Jim Cummings has not been very moral. Shannon Lee & Ralph Sutton of "The SDR Show" on the Gas Digital Network come by and Shannon updates the gang on her hunt for love in the bowels of prison.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
